input.sentences: we were glad to have brought some snacks to the outdoor concert .
we talked with our good friends while we waited for the music to start .
he found a co-worker sitting nearby | so me moved closer to her .
so many people wore trendy jeans that day | so i am glad i wore mine too !
lo and behold my sister and her fiancee were sitting right behind us !
output.sentences: There was a gathering at the park.
Friends gathered to enjoy the nice weather.
Several couples also showed up and enoyed their time together.
People were standing around chatting all day.
It was a fun sunny day for everyone.
